sen.j: 冷泉 為満（れいぜい ためみつ、永禄2年4月25日 (旧暦)（1559年5月31日） - 元和 (日本)5年2月14日 (旧暦)（1619年3月29日））は戦国時代 (日本)後期から江戸時代初期にかけての公卿、歌人。
sen.e: Tamemitsu REIZEI (May 31, 1559 - March 29, 1619) was Kugyo (the top court official) and a poet who lived from the late Sengoku period (period of warring states) to the early Edo period.
Tamemitsu REIZEI (May 31, 1559 - March 29, 1619) was a Kugyo (top court official) and a poet who lived from the late Sengoku period (period of warring states) to the early Edo period.
Tamemitsu REIZEI (June 10, 1559 - March 29, 1619) was a kugyo (high court noble) and a poet who lived from the late Sengoku period (period of warring states) to the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: May 31 がユリウス暦だったことからJune 10 に修正しました。Kugyo (top court official) をkugyo (high court noble) に修正しました。

sen.j: 冷泉家（上冷泉家）の当主。
sen.e: He was the head of the Reizei family (the Kami-Reizei family).
He was the head of the Reizei family (the Kami-Reizei family).
He was the head of the Reizei family (the Kami-Reizei family).
His father was Tamemasu REIZEI.
His father was Tamemasu REIZEI.
His father was Tamemasu REIZEI.

sen.j: 子に冷泉為頼、藤谷為賢（藤谷家の祖）、娘（鷹司教平側室）、娘（綾小路高有側室）らがいる。
sen.e: His children were Tameyori REIZEI, Tamekata FUJITANI (founder of the Fujitani family), and two daughters (concubine of Norihira TAKATSUKASA and concubine of Takaari AYANOKOJI).
His children were Tameyori REIZEI, Tamekata FUJITANI (founder of the Fujitani family), and two daughters (concubine of Norihira TAKATSUKASA and concubine of Takaari AYANOKOJI).
His children were Tameyori REIZEI, Tamekata FUJITANI (founder of the Fujitani family), and two daughters (concubine of Norihira TAKATSUKASA and concubine of Takaari AYANOKOJI).
His official position was Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) Dainagon (Major Councilor).
His official position was Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) Dainagon (Major Councilor).
His official position was Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) Dainagon (chief councilor of state).
sen.cmt: (Major Councilor) を (chief councilor of state) に修正しました。

sen.e: His original name was Tamefusa.
His original name was Tamefusa.
His original name was Tamefusa.

sen.j: 法名は松龍院月照玄覚。
sen.e: His Buddhist name was Shoryuingesshogenkaku.
sen.cmt: 松龍院月照玄覚→読み方不明
sen.e: His Buddhist name was Shoryuingesshogenkaku.
His Buddhist name was Shoryuingesshogenkaku.
